title: Radiology Review Manual
description:
The #1 radiology board review is now in its thoroughly updated new Seventh Edition!

"Try before you buy" - Download the FREE App, which includes sample content. In-App purchase required to unlock all content.

ABOUT: Radiology Review Manual

Based on: 8th edition
Author: Wolfgang Dahnert, M.D.
Publisher: Wolters Kluwer Health | Lippincott Williams & Wilkins
ISBN-13: 978-1609139438

FULL DESCRIPTION:
The #1 radiology board review is now in its thoroughly updated new Seventh Edition! Through six editions and translated into several foreign languages, Dr. Dähnert's has helped thousands of readers prepare for—and successfully complete—their written boards. This latest update is based on the 7th edition with additional features, enhanced functionality and ongoing updates. 

Radiology Review Manual organized by body region and provides extensive lists of image findings and differential diagnoses that are associated with specific disease entities. 

Key Features
- An accessible outline format enables the reader to find information quickly
- Includes differential diagnoses for common clinical presentations
- Includes 7 Calculators and 1 interactive flowcharts which helps in making quick decision
- Acronyms, shorthand, and mnemonics used throughout for rapid study and review
- Lists of memory joggers and facts for fast review

SPECIAL FEATURES:
Locate a disease, symptom or medication in the fastest possible manner:
- Navigate using multiple indices
- History to open frequently visited pages
- Bookmarks 

NEVER FORGET ANYTHING:
Mark topics with relevant information:
- Voice memos
- Annotations with scribble, doodle or text
You choose the method to note this regardless of the context you are in to ensure that the important facts are available whenever you access the topic, whether it is tomorrow or six months from now.

summary: Green bible for board exam preparation, in the daily practice of radiology.
